scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:font && npm run postinstall:lit
scripts.postinstall:font: wget https://use.fontawesome.com/releases/v6.5.1/fontawesome-free-6.5.1-web.zip -O fontawesome.zip && unzip fontawesome.zip && rm fontawesome.zip && mv fontawesome-* fontawesome && cp fontawesome/css/all.min.css public/css/fontawesome.min.css && cp -R fontawesome/webfonts public/ && rm -R fontawesome
